pkgmetadata.longdescription: ***# AutoNN : A No-Code Automated Machine Learning Framework For Deep Learning enthusiast.## Official Website## InstallationInstall it using pip package manager:```pythonpip install nocode-autonn```Upgrade the package using the following command:```pythonpip install --upgrade nocode-autonn```## Install all the dependencies ```pip install -r requirements.txt```## How to run the file:Open terminal and write the following command:```autonn```## The user interface: ![ezgif com-gif-maker](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/55054089/208089822-6167f0c4-6ff5-4952-815d-ee9c74e09641.gif)
